item.title: Paula add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "You are mine, always, if ye will it or no, if ye want me or nay. Mine, and I willna let ye go" -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Paula add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Fall down again, Bella?' No, Emmett, I punched a werewolf in the face." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Paula add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Paula add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Paula add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "I am Switzerland. I refuse to be affected by territorial disputes between mythical creatures." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Paula add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "I know - I'll play you for it," Alice suggested. "Rock, paper, scissors." Jasper chuckled and Edward sighed. "Why don't you just tell me who wins?" Edward said wryly. Alice beamed. "I do. Excellent." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Paula add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "forgiveness is not a single act, but a matter of constant practice" -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Paula add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "You know, Jacob, if it weren’t for the fact that we’re natural enemies and that you’re also trying to steal away the reason for my existence, I might actually like you." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Paula add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "You live a thousand lives when you read a thousand books." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Paula add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Hey, Rosalie? Do you know how to drown a blonde? Stick a mirror to the bottom of a pool." -- Stephenie Meyer
